description:
Hello students!

Throughout the duration of this course you will learn step by step how to create and publish top selling children’s books on the Amazon Kindle. By the end of this class you will be able to do the following with ease:

  • ·Navigate around the Kindle Direct Publishing Platform
  • ·Find book ideas that are bound to sell
  • ·Have the books written and drawn for you
  • ·Use various marketing techniques to increase sales
  • ·Publish a Children’s Ebook on Amazon Kindle
  • ·Make Ebook available in physical book format
  • ·Create a steady flow of monthly passive income

If you are eager to start an online passive business that requires minimal start-up costs and that has the potential to grow month after month, then this is definitely the course for you!
title: How To Publish Children's Books Without Writing a Word
